summary: The world is against Fifteen-year-old Matteo. He has no friends and his parents seem to live in a different universe. One night two men carry him off: sent to a remote alp, where he is forced to spend the summer working hard.
cast: Rahel Ammann|Andrew Bews|Reikon Devour|Naomi Ernst|Patric Gehrig|Sascha Gisler|Veton Hamza|Mike Inglin|Jyrki Kakko|Thomas Korak|John Leuppi|Benjamin Lutzke|Anna-Katharina MÃ¼ller|Ivana Nicolic|Yiannis Pennetta|Ella Rumpf|Livia S. Reinhard|Ernst C. Sigrist|Ste|Guy Wyssen
title: Chrieg
